__comment__: This file was automatically created by mcresources
name: New Molds

pages.title: Sheet Mold
pages.text: The $(thing)Sheet Mold$() is created with an $(thing)Engineering's Blueprint$() at the $(thing)Engineering's Workbench$(). With it, you can create metal sheets of all metals at the $(thing)Metal Press$().

pages.title: Block Mold
pages.text: The $(thing)Block Mold$() is created in the same way. You can create $(thing)Block of Steel$() and $(thing)Block of Uranium$() with it.
